title: Lots of Turkey Reds for sale

posts.post_title: Lots of Turkey Reds for sale
posts.post_content:
T3 Turkey Red cards, all PSA graded.  Front and back scans available, prices include insured shipping.  In general, these cards have very nice eye appeal for the grade, as I concentrated on eye appeal before grade when I built my set.  

Mark
[url]drumback2@cox.net[/url]
